note.p: Birth: Anderton, Great Budworth parish, Cheshire, England (26 February 1789)
Death: Higher Broughton, Manchester, Lancashire (18 June 1861)
Burial: Anderton, Great Budworth parish, Cheshire
Research Field: Applied mathematics, structural mechanics
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1862-1863 vol 12 pp xi-xiii
References: R W Jones, 'Dalton's unfortunate choice' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 15-33
